Welcome to BBC Youth!

We exist simply to build relationships with students and through those relationships to help the students believe in and walk with Christ.

We do this through Sunday school, Wednesday night bible study (The Walk), and monthly events (called The Big Event) that provide opportunities to engage relationally with students, through which we teach Godâ€™s Word.

Youth Has Moved To Wednesdays

05 Oct 2011

As of today, Wednesday, October 5th, Youth will meet on Wednesdays from 7-9pm. We usually start of with a game or two, have some snacks, and then dig into God’s word. Join us!
